name: @dnlup/doc
description: Get usage and health data about your Node.js process

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ts
scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:ts && npm run test:esm
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:js -- --coverage-report=lcovonly && npm run test:ts && npm run test:esm
scripts.bench: npm run bench:base && npm run bench:doc
scripts.bench:resourceUsage: npm run bench:base && npm run bench:doc:resourceUsage
scripts.bench:base: PORT=3000 concurrently -k -s first "node benchmarks/base.js" "node -e 'setTimeout(()=>{}, 1000)' && autocannon -d 60 -c 100 -p 10 localhost:3000"
scripts.bench:doc: PORT=3000 concurrently -k -s first "node benchmarks/doc.js" "node -e 'setTimeout(()=>{}, 1000)' && autocannon -d 60 -c 100 -p 10 localhost:3000"
scripts.bench:doc:resourceUsage: PORT=3000 concurrently -k -s first "node benchmarks/docResourceUsage.js" "node -e 'setTimeout(()=>{}, 1000)' && autocannon -d 60 -c 100 -p 10 localhost:3000"
scripts.postnext: npm run push && npm publish --tag next

author: Daniele Belardi <dwon.dnl@gmail.com>
